pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, June 6, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Chile, Gabriel Boric.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister and the President of Chile, Gabriel Boric, will make an announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of Women and Gender Equality and Youth Marci Ien will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and the President of Chile, Gabriel Boric, will participate in a Q&A discussion with local high school students. Minister of Environment and Climate Change Steven Guilbeault will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:45 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
